content: cute salty pretzel adorable christmas decoration gift addition for loved ones or a keychain warning this ornament pattern is so addictive materials yarn i used holst garn supersoft wool col goldcrest needles i used 4 double pointed needles size 2 5mm darning needle stuffing i used leftover yarn optional tweezers beads bead needle sewing thread in color similar to yarn abbreviations co cast on k knit sts stitches dpn double pointed needles 1 instructions co 12 sts onto 3 dpns and join for working in the round k all sts work until the piece measures 32 cm or desired length to form a pretzel cut the thread leaving about 50 cm for sewing your pretzel using darning needle slip live sts but don t closed yet using tweezers stuff the pretzel pull the yarn and close close the other end give the form of a pretzel and sew in places of contact secure and hide the ends use steam if your yarn needs it optionally add beads to make the pretzel salted you can also embroider salt using a bright thread have nice knitting and share this pattern with friends tag me on instagram @julita_bialkowska use hashtag #cutesaltypretzel 2
